com.test.login.controller

Class CustomizedResponseEntityExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
      • com.test.login.controller.CustomizedResponseEntityExceptionHandler

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class CustomizedResponseEntityExceptionHandler
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
    CustomizedResponseEntityExceptionHandler handles exceptions of throughout a whole application by using @ControllerAdvice annotations
    Since:
    2019-10-30
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Anita Devdare
